content.rendered:
Red Rose Everyday Rice is the affordable range of everyday rice to make each meal memorable. It is the perfect choice for desserts like Kheer & savory dishes such as Curd Rice or Khichdi.
It packs both health and flavor, fulfilling your daily nutritional requirements and appeasing your taste buds like never before. The broken grains provide a soft texture equally delightful on its own as it is with side dishes or curries. Our Everyday Rice is a one-of-a-kind product with its unique, fresh flavor and distinctive rich aroma.
Grown & harvested in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian subcontinent, this rice is full of essential vitamins & nutrients that will make your meal healthy along with a delectable taste. Organically matured for at least two years for better quantity, fluffiness & yield. The aging process also delivers the unique Basmati aroma & taste to the rice.
All Sona Cereal products are produced following international quality standards, cleaned, sorted & packed in supreme, hygienic & state-of-the-art facilities, without coming in contact with the human touch.

  • Suitable for everyday cooking
  • Perfectly aged broken rice
  • Distinctive aroma & flavor
  • Perfect for recipes such as Kheer, Khichdi, etc
  • Grains that do not stick to each after being cooked
